transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Customer: Hello. Haan, sir mai ye keh rahi hu ki aap ab Bhumika ko share kar dijiye. Jo complaint raise hui hai wo Bhumika ke against hai.
Customer: Madam aise kisi ki wo 24 hours ke baad disappear ho jati hai chat, thik hai? Mai aise kisi ko kuch nahi de raha. Mai account ke liye bol dunga unse band karne ke liye, thik hai? Shor aarao. Mai kisi ko kuch nahi bol raha tum.
Executive: Sir, suniye meri baat. Aap share kariye na hume ki unhone aapko diya hua hai to mai aapka karwati hu na share.
Customer: Are yaar sun rahe ho. Thoda sa tum ye nahi samajh rahi ye batao chat disappear ho jati hai to fir chat clear ho jati hai.
Whatsapp pe.
Executive: To ya to aap us unka number de rahe hai jinhone aapka karwaya tha unka number aapko de rahe hai aap unse baat kariye kahiye ki mera karwao instantly nahi to tumhare against karwaunga mai complaint.
Customer: Aap to mai complaint kar de rahe na sir baar baar.
Executive: Mai diwala Saturday aur Sunday ko dekh raha hu. Monday ko.
Executive: Sir, sun kyu nahi rahe aap meri baat kyu nahi samajh rahe.
Customer: Uska naam Monday ka Saturday hai.
Executive: To fir bhi Bhumika ke against aayega na sir. Bhumika ke against complaint aayegi. Aap mujhe bas us raat jo hai person mai unka mai unse baat kar leti hu. Thik hai? Unse baat karke karti hu. Aap mujhe ek baar dhund lijiye agar kahi mil raha hai. Mai ye keh rahi hu ki jo aapne complaint raise ki hai na wo Bhumika ke against aapne kar diya hai. To Bhumika pe baat aa rahi hai ki Bhumika ne nahi karwaya. To mai isko close kar deti hu aur direct Bhumika se kehti hu aapko normal call kare.
Customer: Chalo kisi se call wall mat karwao. Thoda busy bhi hu. Mai ab kal dekh lunga aapko, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai. Mai aapko feedback call jayega sir aap okay kar dijiyega. Mai ek baar unse baat karti hu jinhone aapka karwaya hai. Unse baat karke aapka karwati hu. Thik hai aap tension mat lijiye. Aapne jo bataya tha kya naam tha unka? Rohit Dubey jo aapne bola hai mujhse.
Customer: Jo mail pe dala tha na aapne.
Executive: Rohit Dubey na?
Customer: Haan sir ho jayega. Unse mai baat kar lungi abhi.
Customer: To ab batao.
Executive: Agar unhone diya hai to karwa denge. Sir dekho.
Executive: To abhi mai close kar rahi hu aapke ticket ko kyuki wo Bhumika ke against aayi hai. Aap bas feedback me yes kar dena. Aapka mai buylead ka karwati hu unse pata karke. Nahi agar hua to mai unke against complaint.
Customer: Hmm thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Bataiye. To mai jo Rohit ji aapne bataya na unke against complaint raise karungi.
Thik hai? Sir par hume paper me chahiye hota hai. Hamare paas to naya account aaya hai na aapka. Hum kaise de denge jab hume bhi to upar lagana padta hai tabhi to hum de paate hai na sir. Aap thoda sa samjho is baat ko. Aap hume bol rahe ho ki aap nahi karwa rahe ho. Par hamare paas agar aap mujhe agar message hota aap mujhe de dete instantly to mai jhat se aapka 50 usi time karwa deti. Unhone agar karwaya hoga na aapke dosto ne to aisa nahi hai ki unhone unko mail ya to likh ke diya hoga ya to message me diya hoga. Wo to sir head office me to check hota hi hai. Bina check kiye sir aap bhi to business kar rahe ho. Aap bina check kiye kaise kisi ko kuch bhi de doge?
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na? To is har cheez ka ek process hota hai sir. Aap ye mat samjho ki hum aapka karne ke liye nahi baithe ki hum aapka karenge nahi. Karenge to hai bilkul bhi, bilkul sir. Par at least hume mil to jaye ID. Thoda to aapko hume time dena padega na samajhne ke liye ki kaha pe kisne aapko bola hai ki ye cheeze nahi hai to hum unko pakde unse fir karwaye aapka. To aapko hume thoda time hai kyuki closing hai na sir. To hum bhi nahi kar paate wo department hai wo available hai ki nahi hai ye sab hota hai thoda sa time lagta hai. Instant agar hamare agar aapne hume message de diya hota na ki inhone 50 mera karwaya hai aapko mujhe message mila hai aap mujhko karwaiye. Thik hai? To instantly mai apne upar jaake ye karwa deti sir. Thik hai? Par abhi aapke paas message bhi nahi hai uska aap keh rahe ho ki disappearing me ho gaya hai mera nahi hai usme. Thik hai? To fir ab sir hume bhi to fir unse baat karni jisne diya usko to pakadna padega na baat karne ke liye. Ki aisa aisa hai to karke dijiye hume mail dijiye jo aapne unko likh ke bheja hai. To hum unko accountable banayenge na sir. Hum kyu aap
Executive: Haan. Aur problem agar sir iske alawa aapko koi bhi problem hogi service se leke buylead to mai ye thik hai iske liye baat karti hu unse jinhone aapka Rohit Dubey ne karwaya hai ya unhone kisi aur ke aage karwaya hai to wo mai aapka karwati hu. Uske alawa agar aapko apne catalog se related thik hai ya IndiaMART ke account se related koi bhi aur dikkat aati hai thik hai to aap direct Bhumika ka number apne phone me save kar lijiye aur direct unko call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Wahi aapke account manager rahengi aapka pure.
Executive: Haan. Pure saal ke liye aapki account manager jo rahengi wo wahi rahengi. Thik hai? To kabhi bhi problem kuch bhi aata hai. Ab ye wala jo issue hai wo mai sir ek baar baat karti hu. Aapka abhi hum ticket close kar rahe hai kyuki wo Bhumika ke against aaya hai. To aap feedback me unko yes kar dijiyega sir. Aur isko ab mai aapka solve karwati hu to mujhe aap uske liye char paanch din ka time dijiye mai karwati hu usko sir.
Thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buylead to be activated.

- Complaint raised against Bhumika.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Will raise complaint against Rohit Dubey.

- Asked to provide feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call in 4-5 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaint, account manager, feedback

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
